com.github.joschi.dropwizard.elasticsearch.managed

Class ManagedEsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.joschi.dropwizard.elasticsearch.managed.ManagedEsClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.yammer.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed

    public class ManagedEsClient
extends Object
implements com.yammer.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed
    A Dropwizard managed Elasticsearch Client. Depending on the EsConfiguration a Node Client or a TransportClient a is being created and its lifecycle is managed by Dropwizard.
    See Also:
    Node Client, Transport Client

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManagedEsClient(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client)
      Create a new managed Elasticsearch Client from the provided Client.
      ManagedEsClient(EsConfiguration config)
      Create a new managed Elasticsearch Client.
      ManagedEsClient(org.elasticsearch.node.Node node)
      Create a new managed Elasticsearch Client from the provided Node.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagedEsClient

        public ManagedEsClient(EsConfiguration config)
        Create a new managed Elasticsearch Client. If EsConfiguration.nodeClient is true, a Node Client is being created, otherwise a TransportClient is being created with EsConfiguration.servers as transport addresses.
        Parameters:
        config - a valid EsConfiguration instance

      • ManagedEsClient

        public ManagedEsClient(org.elasticsearch.node.Node node)
        Create a new managed Elasticsearch Client from the provided Node.
        Parameters:
        node - a valid Node instance

      • ManagedEsClient

        public ManagedEsClient(org.elasticsearch.client.Client client)
        Create a new managed Elasticsearch Client from the provided Client.
        Parameters:
        client - an initialized Client instance

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws Exception
        Starts the Elasticsearch Node (if appropriate). Called before the service becomes available.
        Specified by:
        start in interface com.yammer.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed
        Throws:
        Exception - if something goes wrong; this will halt the service startup.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws Exception
        Stops the Elasticsearch Client and (if appropriate) Node objects. Called after the service is no longer accepting requests.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface com.yammer.dropwizard.lifecycle.Managed
        Throws:
        Exception - if something goes wrong.

      • getClient

        public org.elasticsearch.client.Client getClient()
